text: Hey <@U01RQTXM5GW>, can you DM me a link to your email/template and I can take a look
Hey - is there an easy way to automatically append a param to all links in emails? Wanting to add contactId so we can reliably use it to identify contacts who are clicking links in emails.

As a note - the site is on HubSpot's CMS and we're currently relying on HubSpot's identification, but we're finding it unreliable. Especially because contacts are only identified on their first click and not on subsequent link clicks.
It is <@UKGV272KS>, thank you! <@U9KA594Q3> i've DM:ed you!
